title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part are in implementation of the

New York State Freedom of Information Law and of the regulations governing
public access to records promulgated by the State Committee on Public Access to

Records. The provisions of this Part are applicable to all board
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
226.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
